class.name: point_cloud_transport/organized_pub
class.description: This plugin publishes a CompressedPointCloud2 message as a png-compressed, organized pointcloud. If the pointcloud is not already organized, it is organized via pin-hole projection. The projection is configurable.

class.name: point_cloud_transport/organized_sub
class.description: This plugin decompresses a png-compressed, organized CompressedPointCloud2 message into a PointCloud2 message.
